parameters.jsCode:
const item = $input.item.json;

const context = {
  firstName: item['First Name'] || '',
  lastName: item['Last name'] || '',
  businessName: item['Business Name'] || '',
  businessType: item['Business type'] || '',
  position: item.Position || '',
  email: item.Email || '',
  website: item.Website || '',
  address: item.Address || '',
  
  qualificationStatus: item['Status'] || '',
  aiScore: item['AI Score'] || 0,
  aiReasoning: item['AI Reasoning'] || '',
  aiUrgency: item['AI Urgency'] || '',
  painPoints: item['Pain Points Identified'] || '',
  servicesTheyOffer: item['Expertise'] || '',
  bestServiceFit: item['Service Fit'] || '',
  websiteSummary: item['Website Summary'] || '',
  
  firstEmailSubject: item['Email Subject'] || '',
  firstEmailBody: item['Email Body'] || '',
  followUp1Subject: item['Follow-Up Subject'] || '',
  followUp1Body: item['Follow-Up Email Body'] || '',
  followUp2Body: item['Final Follow-Up Email Body'] || '',
  
  emailCount: parseInt(item['Email Count']) || 0,
  contactedDate: item['Contacted Date'] || null,
  firstEmailSent: item['Email Sent'] || null,
  followUp1Sent: item['Follow-Up Sent'] || null,
  followUp2Sent: item['Final Follow-Up Sent'] || null,
  replied: item.Replied || false
};

return {
  json: {
    ...item,
    context: context
  }
};

const item = $input.item.json;

const context = {
  firstName: item['First Name'] || '',
  lastName: item['Last name'] || '',
  businessName: item['Business Name'] || '',
  businessType: item['Business type'] || '',
  position: item.Position || '',
  email: item.Email || '',
  website: item.Website || '',
  address: item.Address || '',
  
  qualificationStatus: item['Status'] || '',
  aiScore: item['AI Score'] || 0,
  aiReasoning: item['AI Reasoning'] || '',
  aiUrgency: item['AI Urgency'] || '',
  painPoints: item['Pain Points Identified'] || '',
  servicesTheyOffer: item['Expertise'] || '',
  bestServiceFit: item['Service Fit'] || '',
  websiteSummary: item['Website Summary'] || '',
  
  firstEmailSubject: item['Email Subject'] || '',
  firstEmailBody: item['Email Body'] || '',
  followUp1Subject: item['Follow-Up Subject'] || '',
  followUp1Body: item['Follow-Up Email Body'] || '',
  followUp2Body: item['Final Follow-Up Email Body'] || '',
  
  emailCount: parseInt(item['Email Count']) || 0,
  contactedDate: item['Contacted Date'] || null,
  firstEmailSent: item['Email Sent'] || null,
  followUp1Sent: item['Follow-Up Sent'] || null,
  followUp2Sent: item['Final Follow-Up Sent'] || null,
  replied: item.Replied || false
};

return {
